Description: East Arlington - Walk to Alewife! Availeble for September 1 move-in! 2 BR first floor apartment in classic 2 family home on corner lot.. Beautiful hardwood floors and woodwork throughout. Renovated kitchen w/dishwasher & disposal, new bathroom, off-street parking for 2 cars, 1 in garage, laundry in basement. Two blocks to Mass Ave, steps away from shops/restaurants/Capitol Theater and buses to Harvard, Porter & Alewife. 2 blocks to Minuteman bike path. Easy access to Route 2. No Smoking, no pets. 1 year lease, 1st and security, Broker fee Email only to see! No calls
